thread.title: Park Ji Hyun Joins YoonA And More In "The King Loves" | Soompi
thread.title_full: Park Ji Hyun Joins YoonA And More In "The King Loves" | Soompi

author: U. Kim
title: Park Ji Hyun Joins YoonA And More In "The King Loves" | Soompi
text:
Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Rookie actress Park Ji Hyun is confirmed to appear in MBC’s “ The King Loves ” as Eun San’s ( YoonA ‘s) handmaid, Bi Yeon. Eun San treats Bi Yeon like a true friend, and the two characters have a strong bond with each other. 
Park Ji Hyun expressed, “Last week, we wrapped up our first shooting, and I am thankful that I got the chance to work with such highly esteemed seniors and staff. I hope to properly convey Bi Yeon’s different emotions like sadness, pain, love, and happiness. I will do my best to move our viewers’ hearts, so please keep an eye on us.”
